item.title: unpackme - PicoCTF Write-Up
item.description: Introduction Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Today, we’re going to take a look at the ‘unpackme’ challenge on PicoCTF by LT ‘syreal’ Jones. The difficulty level is medium." Challenge Description Can you get the flag? Reverse engineer this binary . Solution So, let’s make the binary executable using chmod. chmod +x unpackme-upx Now, let’s try running the executable and see what it does. â”Œâ”€â”€(printnã‰¿printn)-[~] â””â”€$ ./unpackme-upx What's my favorite number? 1 Sorry, that's not it!
